{{Description|Remnants of old memories have been concentrated within [[Domains]] of late... Use the power of [[Original Resin]] to cause the silver tree to bloom and receive blessings from the past.}}
'''Overflowing Favor''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/04/14 04:00 - 2025/04/21 03:59

===Requirements===
* Adventure Rank 20 or above
* Activate the corresponding "[[Domain of Blessing]]"

===Summary===
* During the "Overflowing Favor" event, successfully challenge "Domains of Blessing" and consume "Original Resin" to double your rewards when claiming domain rewards. You can double your rewards up to 3 times a day!
